filter.addressPlaceholder: Enter a city, country or address

texts.shareContacts: Also you can share your contacts with the people who booked your events. You can do that on your personal profile settings page.

instructionsOffline.label: Instructions for OFFLINE events
instructionsOffline.help: Instructions on preparations for offline events. Don't write a guide on how to get to the location - you have to do that on the new event screen.

instructionsOnline.label: Instructions for ONLINE events
instructionsOnline.help: Instructions  on preparations for online events.

texts.noSlots: Your experience is not showing up in the search because it has no events in the schedule.

texts.upload5Photos: You need to upload at least 5 photos to make your Experience page look good. It can be photos from your events, photos of you, photos of your belongings - anything, that will help to get know you better.
texts.dragNDropPhotos: Drag & drop photos into this container
texts.chooseFiles: Choose files on your local disk
